meanings.definition: A person who overreaches in their actions or ambitions.
meanings.sent1: The overreachers in the group always try to do too much at once.
meanings.sent2: She was known as one of the overreachers in the company, always taking on more than she could handle.
meanings.sent3: The overreachers at the party attempted to juggle too many things and ended up dropping everything.
meanings.sent4: The team of overreachers reached for the stars but ended up falling short.
meanings.sent5: Beware of overreachers, for they may promise more than they can deliver.

meanings.definition: The act of overreaching or exceeding one's limits.
meanings.sent1: His overreachers often led to mistakes and setbacks.
meanings.sent2: The overreachers in the project caused delays due to their unrealistic goals.
meanings.sent3: The overreachers in the race tried to take a shortcut but got lost instead.
meanings.sent4: The company's overreachers pushed boundaries but sometimes crossed the line.
meanings.sent5: The concept of overreachers reminds us to stay within our capabilities for success.
